This game was very fun to play a few years ago but it has gone shit and lost all of it's hype.

At first, being a minecraft player, I hated this game. But 2 years after I bought the game, and started to get sick of Minecraft, I absolutely loved this game. Lots of my free time now is spent playing this game, the little that I have. Love it to death. 100% reccomend.
Makes me really angry and sad. 10/10 would recommend to play with friends.
